de.unihannover.se.iviewxjava.iviewx.eyetracker

Class ETConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unihannover.se.iviewxjava.iviewx.eyetracker.ETConnectionManager

  • public class ETConnectionManager
extends Object
    Manages a connection to a RED-m eyetracker.

    There can only be one active connection at a time.
    Having multiple instances of this class will result in unintuitive behavior because of shared internal state. Please use the IViewX class as a central access point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ETConnectionManager(de.unihannover.se.iviewxjava.iviewxapi.IViewXAPILibrary lib)
      Constructs a IView X ConnectionManager that uses the provided IView X SDK binding.

      • ETConnectionManager

        public ETConnectionManager(de.unihannover.se.iviewxjava.iviewxapi.IViewXAPILibrary lib)

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(String sendIp,
                    int sendPort,
                    String receiveIp,
                    int receivePort)
        Connects to a IView X Server that manages a RED-m eyetracker.
        Parameters:
        sendIp - IP on which messages will be send to the server
        sendPort - Port on which messages will be send to the server
        receiveIp - IP on which messages will be received from the server
        receivePort - Port on which messages will be received from the server
        Throws:
        ETException - If an error occurred while connecting
        ETServerException - If the IView X Server could not be found
        ETParameterException - If one or more parameter values are invalid
        ETConnectionException - If no connection could be established

      • connectLocal

        public void connectLocal()
        Connects to locally running IView X Server that manages a RED-m eyetracker.
        Throws:
        ETException - If an error occurred while connecting
        ETServerException - If the IView X Server could not be found
        ETConnectionException - If no connection could be established

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects from the currently connected server.
        Throws:
        ETException - If an error occurred while disconnecting
        ETSocketException - If the used sockets could not be deleted

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns true if the ETIViewXConnectionManager manages a active connection.
        Returns:
        true if the ETIViewXConnectionManager manages a active connection

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int seconds)
        Sets the connection timeout in seconds.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Number of seconds before timeout will occur
        Throws:
        ETException - If an error occurred while setting the new timeout
        ETParameterException - If the new timeout value is out of range
